Sentence.sentence: We need very broad participation to fully address the global tragedy that results when countries fail to take into account the negative impact of their carbon emissions on the rest of the world.
Overly strict standards often fail, James Bartram, a WHO water-health expert, said.
But researchers are improving systems to measure a teacher's performance throughout the year, and, with three years of data, it's usually possible to tell which teachers are failing.
More than 130 U.S.banks failed in 2009.
More than 130 U.S. banks failed in 2009.
A new study has failed to find any conclusive evidence that lifestyle changes can prevent cognitive decline in older adults.
This might not be right, but school-leavers who fail to acknowledge as much risk making the wrong decision about going to university.
Efforts to create one of the world's largest ocean sanctuaries failed because of Russia's obstruction.
They fail to give adequate help to the needy students.
Other initiatives fail to break down the data, too.
It fails to prepare students to face the challenges of modem times.
From the standpoint of a traditional educator, this outcome indicated that schooling had failed to help students think about ecosystems and extinction, major scientific ideas.
Education has failed to lead students to think about major scientific ideas.

All the forecasts, plans, and anticipations cited above have failed so miserably because their authors and promoters thought the transitions they hoped to implement would proceed unlike all previous energy transitions, and that their progress could be accelerated in an unprecedented manner.
"Overly strict standards often fail," James Bartram, a WHO water-health expert, said.

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 失败；失败的人/事；故障；失灵

jx.jx_cn_mean: 一定，必定：没有失败的可能

lj.lj_ly: Be here at noon without fail.

entry.def: If you fail to do something that you were trying to do, you are unable to do it or do not succeed in doing it.

example.ex: The Workers' Party failed to win a single governorship...
example.tran: 劳工党连一个州长职位也未能赢得。

example.ex: He failed in his attempt to take control of the company...
example.tran: 他试图掌控公司，但以失败告终。

entry.def: If an activity, attempt, or plan fails, it is not successful.
entry.tran: (活动、尝试、计划等)失败，不成功

example.ex: We tried to develop plans for them to get along, which all failed miserably...
example.tran: 我们试图计划让他们好好相处，但均以惨败告终。

example.ex: He was afraid the revolution they had started would fail...
example.tran: 他担心他们发起的大变革会遭遇失败。

entry.def: If someone or something fails to do a particular thing that they should have done, they do not do it.

example.ex: Some schools fail to set any homework...
example.tran: 有些学校没有布置任何作业。

example.ex: He failed to file tax returns for 1982...
example.tran: 他没有呈报 1982 年的纳税申报单。

entry.def: If something fails, it stops working properly, or does not do what it is supposed to do.

example.ex: The lights mysteriously failed, and we stumbled around in complete darkness...
example.tran: 灯不知怎么地不亮了，我们在一片黑暗中跌跌撞撞地走着。

example.ex: In fact many food crops failed because of the drought.
example.tran: 实际上，因为干旱，很多粮食作物歉收。

entry.def: If a business, organization, or system fails, it becomes unable to continue in operation or in existence.
entry.tran: (企业)倒闭，破产;(机构)解体;(体系)崩溃

example.ex: So far this year, 104 banks have failed.
example.tran: 今年到目前为止，已有 104 家银行倒闭。

example.ex: ...a failed hotel business...
example.tran: 破产的酒店

entry.def: If something such as your health or a physical quality is failing, it is becoming gradually weaker or less effective.
entry.tran: (健康状况、体质等)衰弱，虚弱，衰退

example.ex: He was 58, and his health was failing rapidly...
example.tran: 他 58 岁，身体正在迅速衰老。

example.ex: Here in the hills, the light failed more quickly...
example.tran: 在山区这儿，天黑得更快。

entry.def: If someone fails you, they do not do what you had expected or trusted them to do.

example.ex: We waited twenty-one years, don't fail us now.
example.tran: 我们等了 21 年了，如今不要让我们失望。

example.ex: ...communities who feel that the political system has failed them.
example.tran: 对此套政治体制感到失望的群体

entry.def: If someone fails in their duty or fails in their responsibilities, they do not do everything that they have a duty or a responsibility to do.

example.ex: Lawyers are accused of failing in their duties to advise clients of their rights...
example.tran: 律师们被控未尽到告知当事人其正当权利的职责。

example.ex: If we did not report what was happening in the country, we would be failing in our duty.
example.tran: 如果我们没有报道这个国家正在发生的事情，我们就没有尽到自己的责任。

entry.def: If a quality or ability that you have fails you, or if it fails, it is not good enough in a particular situation to enable you to do what you want to do.
entry.tran: (品质或能力)有负于;(使)不如愿;不够

example.ex: For once, the artist's fertile imagination failed him...
example.tran: 这位画家丰富的想象力曾一度枯竭。

example.ex: Their courage failed a few steps short and they came running back.
example.tran: 还差几步他们却胆怯了，又跑回来了。

entry.def: If someone fails a test, examination, or course, they perform badly in it and do not reach the standard that is required.

example.ex: I lived in fear of failing my end-of-term exams.
example.tran: 我总是担心期末考试不及格。

entry.def: If someone fails you in a test, examination, or course, they judge that you have not reached a high enough standard in it.

example.ex: ...the two men who had failed him during his first year of law school.
example.tran: 在法学院一年级时让他不及格的两个人

entry.def: You say if all else fails to suggest what could be done in a certain situation if all the other things you have tried are unsuccessful.
entry.tran: 如果其他一切都不奏效的话;假如其他都行不通

example.ex: If all else fails, I could always drive a truck.
example.tran: 如果其他都不行，我总还可以开卡车。

entry.def: You can use I fail to see or I fail to understand in order to introduce a statement which indicates that you do not agree with what someone has said or done.
entry.tran: (用以表示不赞成)不明白，看不出

example.ex: That's how it was in my day and I fail to see why it should be different now.
example.tran: 我那时候就是这样的，我搞不懂为什么现在非要弄得不一样。

entry.def: You use without fail to emphasize that something always happens.

example.ex: He attended every meeting without fail.
example.tran: 他逢会必到。

entry.def: You use without fail to emphasize an order or a promise.
entry.tran: (用以强调命令或承诺)一定，必须

example.ex: On the 30th you must without fail hand in some money for Alex...
example.tran: 30 日那天你必须替亚历克斯交一些钱。

example.ex: Tomorrow without fail he would be at the old riverside warehouse.
example.tran: 明天他一定会在河边的旧仓库里。

means.word_mean: 1. fail to do something; leave something undone;

sentences.sentence: "She failed to notice that her child was no longer in his crib"
"The secretary failed to call the customer and the company lost the account"
"Where do today's public schools fail?"
"The attempt to rescue the hostages failed miserably"

means.word_mean: 3. disappoint, prove undependable to; abandon, forsake;

sentences.sentence: "His sense of smell failed him this time"
"His strength finally failed him"
"His children failed him in the crisis"
"The engine finally went"
"The car died on the road"
"The bus we travelled in broke down on the way to town"
"The coffee maker broke"
"The engine failed on the way to town"
"her eyesight went after the accident"
"I fail to understand your motives"
"The teacher failed six students"

means.word_mean: 7. fail to get a passing grade;

sentences.sentence: "She studied hard but failed nevertheless"
"Did I fail the test?"

means.word_mean: 8. fall short in what is expected;

sentences.sentence: "She failed in her obligations as a good daughter-in-law"
"We must not fail his obligation to the victims of the Holocaust"

means.word_mean: 9. become bankrupt or insolvent; fail financially and close;

sentences.sentence: "The toy company went bankrupt after the competition hired cheap Mexican labor"
"A number of banks failed that year"
"The water supply for the town failed after a long drought"
"Her health is declining"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French faillir (verb), faille (noun), based on Latin fallere 'deceive'. An earlier sense of the noun was 'failure to do or perform a duty', surviving in the phrase without fail

sentences.cn: 这就是近年来屡次试图改革立法均告失败的原因，导致美国邮政署若不推迟至关重要的现代化，将无力支付其账单。

sentences.cn: 后来，婚姻失败、事业潦倒，他变得酗酒成性。
sentences.en: Then his marriage failed, his career burned out and his drinking became serious.

sentences.cn: “公园跑”的成功之处正是伦敦奥运会“遗产”的失败之处。
sentences.en: Parkrun is succeeding where London's Olympic "legacy" is failing.

sentences.cn: 当国家政府不能再保证个人人身安全、粮食安全，以及教育和医疗保健这类基本的社会服务时，国家即告失败。
sentences.en: States  fail  when  national  governments  can  no  longer provide  personal  security,  food  security  and  basic  social services such  as  education  and  healthcare.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我很快发现，这个问题的一个答案在于人们如何看待他们失败的原因。
sentences.en: One answer, I soon  discovered, lay in people’s beliefs about why they had failed.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在试图以象征性的 1 英镑将自己卖出去却以失败告终后，该公司决定召集经营者们，接下来，其 800 家店铺中的许多店面有可能要关张了。
sentences.en: Many of its 800 stores are likely to close following the company’s decision to call in administrators  after an attempt to sell the business for a token ￡1 failed.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 有时，Jody 觉得她成功说服了一些学生停止节食；而有时，她觉得她失败了。
sentences.en: Sometimes,  Jody  feels  that  she  succeeds  in  persuading  some students to stop dieting; other  times, she feels that she fails.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 戴克里先的迫害彻底失败了,它未能压制日益壮大的基督徒群体.
sentences.en: The persecution of Diocletian failed completely to suppress the growing Christian community.

sentences.cn: 从%1$S载入布局时失败.
sentences.en: Failed to load overlay from % 1 $ S.

sentences.cn: 偶然失败的项目或失误的机会并没有影响总的进展.
sentences.en: The occasional failed project or neglected opportunity does not jeopardized overall progress.

sentences.cn: 本地音频操作失败.请检查您的头戴式耳机和麦克风是否工作正常.
sentences.en: The local audio operation failed. Verify that your headset or microphone is functioning properly.

sentences.cn: 父亲的生意失败以后, 家里就败落了.
sentences.en: When father's business failed, the family came down.

sentences.cn: 意味深长的是,很多哈佛的商人在晚年都遭受了失败.
sentences.en: Significantly many successful Harvard dealers have failed in later life.

sentences.cn: 后续创建: 创建服务对象失败. 终止.
sentences.en: PostCreate : Failed to create services object. Aborting.

sentences.cn: 赌博是我一生失败的理由.
sentences.en: Gambling is the reason why I have failed through my life.

sentences.cn: 可是如果我们那天失败了, 我们就要永远做狐狸了.
sentences.en: But if we fail that day, we live as a fox forever.

sentences.cn: 为什么我总怀有自己也许会失败的错觉 呢 ?
sentences.en: How come I am always under the delusion that I may fail?

sentences.cn: 假如我的小人被咬了成为了吸血鬼, 是否意味着我挑战失败?
sentences.en: One of my Sims was bitten by a vampire aging. Does this mean I fail?

sentences.cn: 这些错误信息将出现远程存取控制失败了.
sentences.en: These error messages will appear when remote access control has failed.

sentences.cn: 但是安南计划失败了.
sentences.en: But the Annan plan failed.

sentences.cn: 就其本身而言,我并不是失败, 只是在已拥有的成功上失去了掌控权.
sentences.en: I wasn't failing, per se, just losing my grip on the successes I had won.

sentences.cn: 抢救失事船只的一切努力都失败了.
sentences.en: All attempts to salvage the wrecked ship failed.

sentences.cn: 我想把机器修理好,但是失败了.
sentences.en: I tried to fix the equipment but I failed.

sentences.cn: 但这部机器的试车失败了.
sentences.en: The machine failed on its trial run.

sentences.cn: 他驾驶执照考试不及格。
sentences.en: He failed his driving test.

sentences.cn: 主考人员评定，半数以上报考者不及格。
sentences.en: The examiners failed over half the candidates.

sentences.cn: 我考试三门及格，一门不及格。
sentences.en: I got three passes and one fail.

sentences.cn: 我总是担心期末考试不及格。
sentences.en: I lived in fear of failing my end-of-term exams.

sentences.cn: 在法学院一年级时让他不及格的两个人
sentences.en: ...the two men who had failed him during his first year of law school.

sentences.cn: 她想到英语考试有可能不及格就很担心.
sentences.en: The thought that she might fail the English test dismayed her.

sentences.cn: 他考试多次不及格.
sentences.en: He has failed the test many times.

sentences.cn: 他因多门考试不及格, 被迫留班.
sentences.en: After failing in several exams, he was forced to stay in his grade.

sentences.cn: 有些大学课程按及格或不及格评分.
sentences.en: Some college courses are graded in terms of either a pass or a fail.

sentences.cn: 她听说自己考试不及格后感到十分震惊.
sentences.en: She was shocked sideways when she heard that she had failed the exam.

sentences.cn: 许多学生考试不及格.
sentences.en: Many a student fails to pass on the examination.

sentences.cn: 他竟然又一次考试不及格,这是一件令人遗憾的事.
sentences.en: It is a matter to be regretted that he should have failed again in the examination.

sentences.cn: 这样总计就有三名学生因为剽窃而在我的课程中不及格.
sentences.en: That makes a total of three students who have failed my courses because of plagiarism.

sentences.cn: 那么多学生考不及格,真令人泄气.
sentences.en: It's discouraging that so many students have failed.

sentences.cn: 哈斯担心他如果再考不及格, 下一年就得留级了.
sentences.en: Haas was afraid that if he failed his examinations again, he would be kept down next year.

sentences.cn: 考不及格则是他们的梦魇.
sentences.en: Failing them is their nightmare.

sentences.cn: 儿子考试不及格时,母亲皱着眉.
sentences.en: The mother frowned when her son failed in his exam.

sentences.cn: 要是下次作业你再马马虎虎, 我话说在头里,可要给你打不及格了.
sentences.en: If you do such sloppy work again, I promise I'll fail you.

sentences.cn: 我们当中的任何一个都可能考试不及格.
sentences.en: Any one of us could fail in the exam.

sentences.cn: 老师评定她英语不及格.
sentences.en: The teacher failed her in English.

sentences.cn: 很遗憾你的英语考试不及格.
sentences.en: I'm sorry to say that you have failed in your English test.

sentences.cn: 实际上,她考试不及格.
sentences.en: She failed the exam, actually.

sentences.cn: 他考试前没有充分准备, 结果不及格.
sentences.en: He didn't do enough preparation for his exam, and failed.

sentences.cn: 老师要他加把劲儿, 不然考试准不及格.
sentences.en: His teachers told him to pull his socks up , or he'd undoubtedly fail his exam.

sentences.cn: 考试不及格者必须在下一学期伊始参加补考.
sentences.en: Those who fail the final exam have to take examination at the beginning of next semester.

sentences.cn: 我无法相信他识字测试不及格.
sentences.en: I can't believe that he failed the literacy test.

sentences.cn: 你又在吹牛了. 你要是不及格 呢 ?
sentences.en: You're bragging again. What if you failed?

sentences.cn: 他考试不及格,但依我看,他并不太在乎.
sentences.en: He failed in the examination but I don't think he cares very much.

sentences.cn: 她英语不及格.
sentences.en: She failed in English.

sentences.cn: 经济衰退期间有几家银行倒闭了。
sentences.en: Several banks failed during the recession.

sentences.cn: 今年到目前为止，已有 104 家银行倒闭。
sentences.en: So far this year, 104 banks have failed.

sentences.cn: 2009 年， 超过130家美国的银行倒闭。Baily预测，在2010 年，随着商业房地产贷款到期，很多小型的地区性银行会倒闭。
sentences.en: More than 130 U.S. banks failed in 2009. He predicts high failure rates for smaller, regional banks in 2010 as commercial real estate loans come due.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 时不时就会有金融机构倒闭, 也应该如此.
sentences.en: Financial institutions will fail from time to time, and should.

sentences.cn: 共和党议员巴屈斯提出了共和党人对奥巴马政府解散面临倒闭的机构的建议所存在的担忧.
sentences.en: Republican Spencer Bachus voiced another Republican about the Obama administration's proposals for dissolving failing institutions.

sentences.cn: 认为复杂的大型金融机构规模过大、以至于不能倒闭的观点,可能是错误的.
sentences.en: The view that large and complex financial institutions are too big to fail may be wrong.

sentences.cn: 总有新的商店开张和濒临倒闭的商店关张.
sentences.en: There are always new stores opening and failing stores closing.

sentences.cn: 但是美国政府让雷曼倒闭是正确之举.
sentences.en: The US authorities were, however, right to allow Lehman Brothers to fail.

sentences.cn: 银行一倒闭, 许多小商行也跟着破产了.
sentences.en: When the banks failed, many small businesses smashed up.

sentences.cn: 当一天“之内”有四家银行倒闭的时候, 企业人士一片恐慌.
sentences.en: When four banks failed in one day, there a panic among businessmen.

sentences.cn: 一所学校倒闭 在即,家长们 怨声载道,于是最终有人出面解决.
sentences.en: A school is failing; parents complain; something is eventually done.

sentences.cn: 有几家银行在不景气时期倒闭了.
sentences.en: Several banks failed during the depression.

sentences.cn: 当一天之内有四家银行倒闭的时候, 企业人士一片恐慌.
sentences.en: When four banks failed in one day, there was a panic among businessmen.

sentences.cn: 银行常常卷入关于公司倒闭的官司中.
sentences.en: It was not unusual for the bank to involved in litigation over failed companies.

sentences.cn: 因为董事长的管理不善公司倒闭了.
sentences.en: The company fails because of the chairman's mismanagement.

sentences.cn: 当这间公司倒闭之后, 我父亲成为州的放射健康物理学者.
sentences.en: When this company failed , though, he became a radiation health physicist for the state.

sentences.cn: 新通用汽车有一项很好的特性: 它的规模足够小,以致可以倒闭.
sentences.en: New GM has one good quality: it is small enough to fail.

sentences.cn: 公司不切实际的扩展企图已经造成公司倒闭了.
sentences.en: Unrealistic attempts to expand have caused the company to fail.

sentences.cn: 商行生意衰退,最后倒闭了.
sentences.en: The business faltered and then failed.

sentences.cn: 许多地区性商业银行在近期会倒闭.
sentences.en: Dozens of regional lenders are expected to fail in the coming months.

sentences.cn: 许多公司倒闭了, 特别是在经济衰退时期, 但也有不少公司站稳了脚跟.
sentences.en: Many fail, especially in times of recession, but others take their place.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 政府文件

sentences.cn: 这家商行因资不抵债而倒闭.
sentences.en: The Business failed Because its assets were not so great as its liaBilities.

sentences.cn: 该投资公司想要购并许多间即将倒闭的网路公司.
sentences.en: The investment company wants to buy out many failing Internet companies.

sentences.cn: 因此降低了一家大机构倒闭导致系统瘫痪的风险.
sentences.en: That leaves less chance of gridlock when a big institution fails.

sentences.cn: 如果它们的经营陷入困境, 它们将被允许倒闭.
sentences.en: If they ran into trouble, they would be allowed to fail.

sentences.cn: 那一年,很多银行倒闭.
sentences.en: A number of banks failed that year.

sentences.cn: 这家公司因管理不善倒闭.
sentences.en: Because of the poor management the company failed.

sentences.cn: 几家最大的银行在不景气的时候倒闭了.
sentences.en: Several of the biggest banks failed during the depression.

sentences.cn: 商店倒闭使他陷入了极度的绝望之中.
sentences.en: He sank into the depths of hopelessness after his business failed.

sentences.cn: 大街上成百的商店将会倒闭或关门,因此犯罪行为会不可避免的增多.
sentences.en: High street stores will fail and close the hundreds. Crime will inevitably rise as a result.

sentences.cn: 破产的酒店
sentences.en: ...a failed hotel business...

sentences.cn: 盖特纳解释说, 联邦政府有权接管和清算破产银行.
sentences.en: As Geithner explained, the federal government has the power to take over and liquidate failed banks.

sentences.cn: 但是如果公司破产, 那么就不能保证能收回投资了.
sentences.en: But if it fails, then there is no guarantee of repayment.

sentences.cn: 他的企业破产,财产由清算管理人接管.
sentences.en: His business has failed and is in the hands of the receiver.

sentences.cn: 银行一倒闭, 许多小商行也跟着破产了.
sentences.en: When the banks failed, many small businesses smashed up.

sentences.cn: 这两个担心是一家企业可能因相互联系太紧而不足以导致破产.或是太大而不会导致破产.
sentences.en: These are that a company may be too interconnected to fail or too big to fail.

sentences.cn: 琼斯先生将作为那个破产公司破产的清算管理人.
sentences.en: Mr. Jones will act as receiver for the company that has failed in business.

sentences.cn: 他的生意失败了,他也破产了.
sentences.en: His business failed and he went bankrupt.

sentences.cn: 他失败了, 他的事业最终破产.
sentences.en: He's failed, gone bankrupt in his business at last.

sentences.cn: 由于资金短缺,许多商行破产.
sentences.en: When money is in short supply many businesses fail.

sentences.cn: 而且,公司破产通常是因为管理不善, 而不是因为外部力量.
sentences.en: And companies usually fail because of management shortcomings, rather than external forces.

sentences.cn: 他做生意失败而告破产.
sentences.en: He failed inbusiness and went under.

sentences.cn: Creditsights预计,如果形势再不好转的话,将会有600多家银行破产.
sentences.en: CreditSights estimates that more than 600 banks will fail if conditions stay as they are.

sentences.cn: 但是AIG却被简单地认为规模太大而不能破产.
sentences.en: But AIG was considered simply too big to fail.

sentences.cn: 他们的公司垮了,现在由破产管理人管理.
sentences.en: Their business has failed and is in the hands of the receiver.

sentences.cn: 巴巴拉破产了,她栽了个大跟头.
sentences.en: Barbara came a cropper when her business failed.

sentences.cn: 由于没有足够的资金,这家企业的基础不牢靠, 不久就破产了.
sentences.en: The business was built on sand because it has insufficient capital, and It'soon failed.

sentences.cn: 多数投资者一直以为美国政府不会坐视一家大型金融机构破产.
sentences.en: Most investors had assumed the US government would never let a large financial group fail.

sentences.cn: 历史上,还有银行破产数更多的年份.
sentences.en: More banks have failed in other years.

sentences.cn: 未能从急剧下滑的汽车销量中恢复过来,通用汽车和克莱斯勒已经宣布了破产.
sentences.en: Both companies have declared bankruptcy after failing to recover from a drastic drop in auto sales.

sentences.cn: 投入过少, 银行就会破产.
sentences.en: And if it pays too little, banks could still fail.

sentences.cn: 但其中任何一个的重要性都比不上当金融机构破产时该做的事情.
sentences.en: But none as important as what to do when a large financial institution is failing.

sentences.cn: 目前, 雷曼兄弟破产,美林证券周日同意将其出售给美国银行.
sentences.en: Now, Lehman has failed. Merrill Lynch agreed on Sunday to sell itself to Bank AmericanAmerica.

sentences.cn: 他的公司几乎破产, 但银行帮他渡过了难关.
sentences.en: His company was about to fail, but the bank saw him through.

sentences.cn: 这个电子零售商在去年申请破产后未能使经营状况好转.
sentences.en: The electronics retailer failed to bounce back after filing for bankruptcy last year.

sentences.cn: 如果失败, 通用汽车公司将被迫到第11章破产程序.
sentences.en: If this fails, GM will be forced into Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings.

sentences.cn: 一旦生意失败, 他们便不得不宣布破产, 还可能丧失个人财产.
sentences.en: Once the business fails, they have to declare personal bankruptcy and could lose personal assets, too.

sentences.cn: 债权人可以组成债权人会议,讨论通过破产财产的处理和分配方案或者和解协议.
sentences.en: Creditors who fail lodgeclaims during the respective periods shall be deemed to have abandoned their rights.

sentences.cn: 纳税人也许无论如何都会拒绝偿还破产机构欠外国人的债务.
sentences.en: Taxpayers may in any case refuse to meet failed institutions'liabilities to foreigners.

sentences.cn: 在这里, 没有破产金融机构的银行家可以嘲笑.
sentences.en: Here, there are no bankers of failed institutions to scorn.

sentences.cn: 考虑到目前离婚率已经接近50%，这意味着在美国每年都有上百万的离婚案例——正是缺乏交流给婚姻带来了这场瘟疫。
sentences.en: Given the current divorce rate of nearly 50 percent, that amounts to millions of cases in the United States every year — a virtual epidemic of failed conversation.

sentences.cn: 考虑到目前离婚率已经接近50%，这意味着在美国每年都有上百万的离婚案例——正是缺乏交流给婚姻带来了这场瘟疫。
sentences.en: Given the current divorce rate of nearly 50 percent, that amounts to millions of cases in the United States every year — a virtual epidemic of failed conversation.

sentences.cn: 这个队并不缺乏勇气, 但是他们还是在输掉了比赛.
sentences.en: The team were not short of pluck, but they failed to hold the match.

sentences.cn: 他的演讲缺乏说服力.
sentences.en: His speech failed in persuasiveness.

sentences.cn: 但是科迪克却坚决否定他的公司缺乏创新.
sentences.en: But Mr Kotick vigorously denies that his company fails to innovate.

sentences.cn: 谷场和酒榨,都不够以色列人使用, 新酒也必缺乏.
sentences.en: Threshing floors and wine presses will not feed the people; the new wine will fail them.

sentences.cn: 他是个聪明人,但是缺乏毅力.
sentences.en: He's a clever man but fails in perseverance.

sentences.cn: 他很有能力, 但缺乏耐心.
sentences.en: He has plenty of ability, but fails inpatience.

sentences.cn: 何9:2谷场和酒、都不彀以色列人使用 、 新酒也必缺乏.
sentences.en: Threshing floor and wine press will not feed them , And the new wine will fail them.

sentences.cn: 这个任何事物都可以并且必须通过性别研究的中心观点缺乏实用性.
sentences.en: The central idea that everything can and must be studied through gender fails in practicality.

sentences.cn: 获得性免疫缺乏综合症是一种不断发展的疾病,到最后免疫反应无法得到控制.
sentences.en: HIV is a progressive disease which the immune response ultimately fails to control.

sentences.cn: 他的演讲缺乏证据.
sentences.en: His speech failed in proof.

sentences.cn: 许多人因缺乏果断而失败.
sentences.en: Many men have failed through lack of decision.

sentences.cn: 在商业领域, 一些经营失败的管理者并非缺乏能力,而正是企业家中的精英.
sentences.en: In business, a few failed directorships are a sign of entrepreneurship rather than incompetence.

sentences.cn: 由于没有兴趣而缺乏注意力的.
sentences.en: Failing to give due heed , care, or attention ; inattentive.

sentences.cn: 经验缺乏对莎拉很不利,让她更有可能失败.
sentences.en: Her lack of experience told against Sarah and made her more likely to fail.

sentences.cn: 他由于经验缺乏而失败了.
sentences.en: He failed because of inexperience.

sentences.cn: 他的讲演缺乏说服力和论据.
sentences.en: His speech failed in persuasiveness and proof.

sentences.cn: 他们以为这个青年缺乏经验而会失败, 可是他设法把这件事完成了.
sentences.en: They thought the young man would fail through inexperience, but he contrived to put it across.

sentences.cn: [和合]谷场和酒醡,都不够以色列人使用, 新3酒也必缺乏.
sentences.en: NIV Threshing floors and winepresses will not feed the people; the new wine will fail them.

sentences.cn: 他因缺乏果断力而未能得到提升.
sentences.en: He failed to get promoted for lack of resolution.

sentences.cn: 他因缺乏自信而失败.
sentences.en: He failed through diffidence.

sentences.cn: 这部小说的各部分之间缺乏连贯性。
sentences.en: The various elements of the novel fail to cohere.

sentences.cn: 她的视力日渐衰退。
sentences.en: Her eyesight is failing.

sentences.cn: 经济衰退期间有几家银行倒闭了。
sentences.en: Several banks failed during the recession.

sentences.cn: 他的体力正在衰退.
sentences.en: His powers are failing, ie He is becoming weak.

sentences.cn: 她意识到自己的体力在逐渐衰退.
sentences.en: She was conscious that her strength was failing.

sentences.cn: 后果就是, 美联储避免经济衰退的努力几乎确定无疑会失败.
sentences.en: As a result, the Fed's attempt to avert a recession has almost certainly failed.

sentences.cn: 他的体力在衰退.
sentences.en: His powers are failing.

sentences.cn: 他的健康迅速衰退.
sentences.en: His health is failing rapidly.

sentences.cn: 记忆衰退从我们年轻时就开始.
sentences.en: Memory starts to fail when we are young adults.

sentences.cn: 记忆力衰退.
sentences.en: One's memory is failing.

sentences.cn: 他的听觉在衰退.
sentences.en: His hearing is failing.

sentences.cn: 在开刀以后,他的眼力衰退了.
sentences.en: His eyesight has failed after the operation.

sentences.cn: 他的视力开始衰退.
sentences.en: His sight is beginning to fail.

sentences.cn: 然后他注意到自己的生物信号: 衰退的血压, 不稳定的心跳, 电解液失常.
sentences.en: Then he noticed his bio signs: failing blood pressure, erratic heartbeat, electrolytes all wrong.

sentences.cn: 我们的记忆力开始衰退.
sentences.en: The strength of my memory begins to fail.

sentences.cn: 日本银行当时叫利率降到了0%但仍然无法避免长时间的衰退.
sentences.en: The bank of Japan cut rates to 0 but failed to avoid a long recession.

sentences.cn: 老人不顾体力衰退,坚持继续工作.
sentences.en: The old man persisted in carrying on the work in spite of his failing health.

sentences.cn: 商行生意衰退,最后倒闭了.
sentences.en: The business faltered and then failed.

sentences.cn: 许多公司倒闭了, 特别是在经济衰退时期, 但也有不少公司站稳了脚跟.
sentences.en: Many fail, especially in times of recession, but others take their place.
sentences.from: 英汉非文学 - 政府文件

sentences.cn: 许多小银行在经济衰退期破了产.
sentences.en: Many small banks failed during the recession.

sentences.cn: 健康衰退使人丧志.
sentences.en: Failing health dwindles ambition.

sentences.cn: 他的视力渐渐衰退了.
sentences.en: His eyesight is failing.

sentences.cn: 政府无法及时发现衰退降临, 制定政策又要经过相当长时间.
sentences.en: Politicians traditionally fail to recognise recessions in time, and then take too long to enact stimulus.

sentences.cn: 近两年来,她的健康一直在衰退.
sentences.en: She has been failing in health for the last two years.

sentences.cn: 若肾功能衰退,可通过渗透作用使血液净化.
sentences.en: Blood can be cleaned by osmosis if the kidneys have failed.

sentences.cn: 但是在1990年,多次降息没能阻止美国经济陷入衰退.
sentences.en: But in 1990 several rate cuts failed to stop the American economy from sliding into recession.

sentences.cn: 日本银行将利率下调至零,但仍然无法避免长期衰退.
sentences.en: The Bank of Japan cut rates to zero but failed to avoid a long recession.

sentences.cn: 他的视力衰退了, 妻子和儿子去世了, 和他同时代的人也都逝去.
sentences.en: His eyesight failed, his wife and son died, as did his contemporaries.

sentences.cn: 然而现在美国的一项研究发现人从青年开始记忆力就开始衰退了.
sentences.en: Now an American study has found that memory starts to fail when we are young adults.

sentences.cn: 这种资源衰退的趋势仍在加剧.
sentences.en: The trend that this kind of resources fails still is in aggravate.

sentences.cn: 明显的记忆力衰退对一个国家领导人来说极为不利。
sentences.en: An apparently failing memory is damaging for a national leader.

sentences.cn: 雨量不足，河流干涸。
sentences.en: The rains had failed and the rivers were dry.

sentences.cn: 他最终心有余而力不足.
sentences.en: His strength finally failed him.

sentences.cn: 那计划的构想倒是十分宏伟, 但终因准备不足而告吹.
sentences.en: The plan, brilliant in its conception, failed because of inadequate preparation.

sentences.cn: 苜蓿在有效钙含量不足的土壤上生长不良.
sentences.en: Alfalfa will fail to grow well on soils which lack sufficient amounts of available caleium.

sentences.cn: 对镇上的水的供应经过一场长时间的大旱后不足了.
sentences.en: The water supply for the town failed after a long drought.

sentences.cn: 架构分配失败.请检查机器内存是否不足.
sentences.en: Schema allocation failed. Please check if the machine is running low on memory.

sentences.cn: 这两个担心是一家企业可能因相互联系太紧而不足以导致破产.或是太大而不会导致破产.
sentences.en: These are that a company may be too interconnected to fail or too big to fail.

sentences.cn: 不足之处在于如果某台客户端的网速较满,则导致整个游戏的速度变慢.
sentences.en: The failing of this method is the game speed will slow if one client slow.

sentences.cn: 水供应不足.
sentences.en: The water supply is failing.

sentences.cn: 心绞痛是胸痛, 是发生与心肌供血不足是的压榨样疼痛或者不适.
sentences.en: Angina is pain, squeezing or discomfort that occurs when the heart fails to get enough blood.

sentences.cn: 石油供给不足.
sentences.en: The oil supply failed.

sentences.cn: 而睡眠不足则会导致情绪低落 、 注意力不集中及性格变化.
sentences.en: Failing to get enough sleep can lead to depression, lack of concentration and personality changes.

sentences.cn: 尽管这计划构想绝妙，但终因资金不足而告流产。
sentences.en: The plan was brilliant in its conception but failed because of lack of money.

sentences.cn: 这是一种没有一个到北京的访问者目睹后而会忘记的力量.
sentences.en: This is a power no visitor to modern China can fail to discern.

sentences.cn: 别忘记给他打电话.
sentences.en: Don't fail to ring him up.

sentences.cn: 他们不但不认识今天的严重环境, 并且连历史也忘记了.
sentences.en: They not only fail to appreciate the present grave situation, they have even forgotten history.

sentences.cn: 她永不忘记每周给我写信.
sentences.en: She never fails to write me every week.

sentences.cn: 别忘记再来呀.
sentences.en: Never fail to come again.

sentences.cn: 我到很多地方注册了会员,但是忘记了密码.
sentences.en: I failed to remember my members'password which I have registered.

sentences.cn: 一个细心的人决不会忘记归还借款.
sentences.en: A scrupulous man never fails to give back the borrowed money to its owner.

sentences.cn: 我们每星期都收到他的来信; 他从未忘记写信来.
sentences.en: We receive letters from him every week; he never fails to write.

sentences.cn: 如果失败了, 千万不要忘记失败的 教训.
sentences.en: If fail, never forget the precept of [ with ] failure.

sentences.cn: 14我的亲戚与我断绝.我的密友都忘记我.
sentences.en: My kinsfolk have failed , and my familiar friends have forgotten me.

sentences.cn: 他怎么能忘记带上哄她的巧克力?
sentences.en: Can he fail armed with his chocolate surprise?

sentences.cn: 他从来没有忘记每周给母亲写信.
sentences.en: He never fails to write to his mother every week.

sentences.cn: 舍弃冥王星在于: 它周围太阳的轨道和海王星一致.
sentences.en: That is where Pluto fails: its orbit around the sun crosses paths with Neptune's.

sentences.cn: 偶然失败的项目或失误的机会并没有影响总的进展.
sentences.en: The occasional failed project or neglected opportunity does not jeopardized overall progress.

sentences.cn: 如果他又失误了 呢 ?
sentences.en: If he fails again?

sentences.cn: 双发失误: 连续两次发球失误, 造成失分.
sentences.en: Double fault: A second failed serve in a row, resulting in the loss of the point.

sentences.cn: 当下属无法执行好上司的命令时, 公司的经营管理就会出现严重失误.
sentences.en: When troops below fail to respond to orders from on high, company performance may stumble badly.

sentences.cn: 他做事老谋深算,很少失误.
sentences.en: He is circumspect and farseeing and seldom fails.

sentences.cn: 此项目的失败是因为我们决策的失误.
sentences.en: This failed project was a result of our defect in decision making.

sentences.cn: 考试失误, 他觉得很丧气.
sentences.en: He felt disheartened, as he had failed in the examination.

sentences.cn: 以往的教改失误在哪里 呢 ?
sentences.en: Where is the key of reformation failing?

sentences.cn: 唐娜没能就她的失误给我们一个合理的解释.
sentences.en: Donna failed to give us a rational explanation for her mistake.

sentences.cn: 由于人事安排上的重要失误,他没能完成这一项目.
sentences.en: He failed to complete the project for his fell mistakes in personnel arrangement.

sentences.cn: 由于策划者判断失误，政变失败了。
sentences.en: The coup failed because of miscalculations by the plotters.

sentences.cn: 考试不及格者必须在下一学期伊始参加补考.
sentences.en: Those who fail the final exam have to take examination at the beginning of next semester.

sentences.cn: 选修课不及格者将被处以五十元罚款.
sentences.en: Anyone who fails an elective optional course will be fined 50 Yuan.
